## Icon.setIconLocation() method

Notification that the icon has moved. Update the arrow accordingly.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setIconLocation(xy: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  xy | Coordinate | Absolute location in workspace coordinates. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
